I purchased this bedding for my grandson.content: I purchased this bedding for my grandson who has not been born yet. His dad is an advent sports person, so I knew he would love his son to have it. His mother had already purchased it, so we were both thinking along the same line. We also decked the room out with the lamp, valance and musical mobile. His mom says his room is absolutely gorgeous! Now she is waiting on the little fellow to show up... Good product!

I was trying to find a bedding set cause.content: I was trying to find a bedding set cause we just recelently moved our youngest into a crib. And we have one on the way so I wanted to find something that work if we had a girl or a boy. I like this because even if it is a little more boyish than girlish you can always just add somthing pink if you have a girl. And our household is all about sports so I don't think, if we have a girl, that she will be able to play with anything but footballs, baseballs and every other sports out there.

This is mine and my husbands 4th child a.title: I love this product!!
This is mine and my husbands 4th child a.content: This is mine and my husbands 4th child and I know that paying $200 for a crib set isn't worth it. This being our third boy we wanted a different theme then with our other boys and I couldn't believe how hard it was to find a cute sports bedding until I found this one. I love the price of this bedding and everything that goes with it. I was very happy when I got the set it was just like the picture. I hate the baby looking crib sets I wanted something he could use as a baby and still be able to use as he becomes a toddler and this works awesome for that! It is cute without over doing it. I did notice that I had to wash the sheets a few times over and use softener on it to get them soft but I've found that you have to do that with most of these kind of crib set. I love the colors in this set. I had also purchused the lamp, wall border, sheets, mobile, and valance and I love having the whole matching set. It looks great and works great for my lil man!

I read a lot of good reviews on this set.title: VERY CUTE
I read a lot of good reviews on this set.content: I read a lot of good reviews on this set, and I liked that it was bright, but not so much that it was too loud and tacky. When it came, I was VERY pleased with it! I do love the quilt with the different fabrics. While the baby won't be able to use it at first, I think it will still look nice on a chair in the room until he can. The only reason I didn't give "value" all 5 stars is because the crib sheet does feel quite starchy, but I'm hoping that few washings will soften it up... I was expecting it, though, because I'd already read about it in other reviews. I also liked that the bumpers were actually long enough to wrap around the perimeter of the crib, whereas another set I'd seen the bumpers were just too short to make it all the way. Very cute set, and good quality, as far as I can see!

Yes it was fitted

Yes it's a fitted sheet.
Is the sheet that comes with the set a fitted sheet or do i have to purchase one.
Yes it comes with 1 fitted sheet so I purchased an extra one ($14.97 on walmart.com). Or you can buy just a plain white baby blue or green sheet for cheaper.
Can this bedding set be used with any crib/mattress?
Yes
Can this bedding set be used with any crib/mattress?
All crib mattresses are the same size. Toddler mattresses are the same size as well. So yes they are all the same size and will fit anything.
Does this bedding ste fit a mini crib?
I think that it would be too big. Bc when i put it on regular size crib it fits perfect. I hope this helps so that u dont have to waste your time buying it :)
Does this bedding ste fit a mini crib?
No. But I did see a separate mini-crib set on walmart.com for $30.
Is the fabric pure cotton? Is it soft?
It's 55% cotton 45% polyester. It's not super soft but it's soft enough. It's a good buy for summertime.
Is the fabric pure cotton? Is it soft?
yes
Is the fabric pure cotton? Is it soft?
It's polyester and yes its soft.

It should because all my previous baby bedding (this is my third child) was used in the crib and then the toddler bed. The mattresses are th same size.

Don't think so

No. The bedding does have both light blue and dark blue in it though (see my picture). The fitted sheet is actually a light blue and white checkered pattern with sports stuff on it.

The Bedtime Originals Super Sports Bedding set will transform the nursery into
a haven of fun and comfort for your little one.

This four-piece baby crib set features a navy blue trim and is
embellished with velour corduroy and fleece.

The Bedtime Originals Super
Sports Bedding set is machine washable so cleaning is hassle-free.

Extremely
soft your baby will love to snuggle up with the cozy comforter.

It includes a comforter bumper sheet and
dust ruffle.

Decorate the
nursery with other items in this theme to complete the look.

With a sports themed design
the set is both playful and cute.

This is mine and my husbands 4th child a.title: I love this product!!
This is mine and my husbands 4th child a.content: This is mine and my husbands 4th child and I know that paying $200 for a crib set isn't worth it. This being our third boy we wanted a different theme then with our other boys and I couldn't believe how hard it was to find a cute sports bedding until I found this one. I love the price of this bedding and everything that goes with it. I was very happy when I got the set it was just like the picture. I hate the baby looking crib sets I wanted something he could use as a baby and still be able to use as he becomes a toddler and this works awesome for that! It is cute without over doing it. I did notice that I had to wash the sheets a few times over and use softener on it to get them soft but I've found that you have to do that with most of these kind of crib set. I love the colors in this set. I had also purchused the lamp, wall border, sheets, mobile, and valance and I love having the whole matching set. It looks great and works great for my lil man!

I hate the baby looking crib sets I wanted something he could use as a baby and still be able to use as he becomes a toddler and this works awesome for that! It is cute without over doing it. I did notice that I had to wash the sheets a few times over and use softener on it to get them soft but I've found that you have to do that with most of these kind of crib set. I love the colors in this set. I had also purchused the lamp, wall border, sheets, mobile, and valance and I love having the whole matching set. It looks great and works great for my lil man!

I read a lot of good reviews on this set.title: VERY CUTE
I read a lot of good reviews on this set.content: I read a lot of good reviews on this set, and I liked that it was bright, but not so much that it was too loud and tacky. When it came, I was VERY pleased with it! I do love the quilt with the different fabrics. While the baby won't be able to use it at first, I think it will still look nice on a chair in the room until he can. The only reason I didn't give "value" all 5 stars is because the crib sheet does feel quite starchy, but I'm hoping that few washings will soften it up... I was expecting it, though, because I'd already read about it in other reviews. I also liked that the bumpers were actually long enough to wrap around the perimeter of the crib, whereas another set I'd seen the bumpers were just too short to make it all the way. Very cute set, and good quality, as far as I can see!
